    How to Sample From a Distribution

    how-to-sample.Rmd
    library(samplr)

    Choosing a distibution

    To sample from a distribution, check the abbreviation, as well as the distribution parameters, in the Supported Distributions Vignette. Henceforth we sample from a Normal distribution with mean 0 and standard deviation 1. So, we need: \begin{itemize}{ Distribution Name = “norm”

    Distribution Parameters = A vector with mean and std. In our case: c(0,1). }

    Different Sampling Algorithms
